org.lwjgl.system.libffi

Class ClosureError

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Error
        • org.lwjgl.system.libffi.ClosureError
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ClosureError
extends java.lang.Error
    This error will be thrown by native code, if a Closure instance that has been previously garbage collected is accessed by a callback invocation.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
